casebody.data:
Reginald REESE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 14, 2017

Sean P. Barrett, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Peter A. McShane, state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Reginald Reese's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn.App. 350, 160 A.3d 410 (2017), is denied.
